C:\WINDOWS\system32\wsl.exe --distribution Ubuntu --exec /bin/bash -c "export CMAKE_COLOR_DIAGNOSTICS=ON && export CLION_IDE=TRUE && export JETBRAINS_IDE=TRUE && cd '/mnt/c/Users/Khivus/Education/My-Labs/University/year 2 semester 1/Lab-4-DB/Lab-4-DB/cmake-build-debug' && /usr/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -G 'CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles' '/mnt/c/Users/Khivus/Education/My-Labs/University/year 2 semester 1/Lab-4-DB/Lab-4-DB'; exitcode=$?; sleep 0.001; (exit $exitcode)"
/bin/bash: line 1: /usr/bin/cmake: No such file or directory
